definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: You will have to fasten the lid down with nails .
sentences.chinese: 你必須用釘子把蓋子釘牢。

sentences.english: We have a cover to prevent evaporation.
sentences.chinese: 我們有一個蓋子防止水蒸發。

sentences.english: The cup with a cover is li leis .
sentences.chinese: 那個帶蓋子的杯子是李雷的。

sentences.english: This top fits over the bottle and keeps the teat sterile .
sentences.chinese: 這個蓋子嚴實地蓋在奶瓶上，保持奶嘴無菌。

sentences.english: Close the lid and turn the knob to pork cooking cycle to stew about 15 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 蓋上蓋子，調至肉類檔位燜煮大約15分鐘。

sentences.english: Put the cap back on the toothpaste.
sentences.chinese: 把蓋子重新擰在牙膏管上。

sentences.english: For most newer vehicles, turn the cap until you hear it click three times.
sentences.chinese: 對於新汽車來說，擰緊蓋子，直至聽到響三下。

sentences.english: Now we will create two half-spheres as the eye lids.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們將創建兩個半領域的眼睛蓋子。

sentences.english: What's wrong with the distributor is that the distributor cap is cracked.
sentences.chinese: 配電器的毛病，就是出在蓋子破裂了。

sentences.english: Release the cap with hand in counterclockwise direction.
sentences.chinese: 用手朝逆時針方向鬆動蓋子。

sentences.english: It has a cap that makes a satisfying click sound when it's shut.
sentences.chinese: 它有個蓋子當關上時可以產生一確信的喀嚓聲。

sentences.english: The lid shut with a snap.
He took the cover off the font , and put his white gloves in it.
sentences.chinese: 他揭開聖水器的蓋子，把自己的白手套放了進去。

sentences.english: Dedicated to after the aluminum foil sealing, to tight the loosen lid again.
sentences.chinese: 專用於鋁箔封口後，再次給鬆動的蓋子旋緊。

sentences.english: Tip jar with lid on to shift product into sifter.
sentences.chinese: 提示罐子的蓋子上改變產品的篩子。

sentences.english: Employee got his toe caught in a vent cover.
sentences.chinese: 被通氣孔的蓋子卡傷了腳趾頭。

definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
(of alcohol) to go to one's head/(old) (of a bride-to-be) to bind one's hair into a bun/(of a prostitute) to receive a patron for the first time
above/on top of/on the surface of
to dismantle/to disassemble/to open up (sth sealed)/to unpick
to squeeze out/to extrude/to drain/to find the time/to burst out
